H0.text: Who is the detective played by Martin Shaw in a t.v. series set in North East England in the 1960's. Inspector Morse

H1.text: Who is the detective played by Martin Shaw in a t.v. series set in North East England in the 1960's. Detective Superintendent Andy Dalziel

H2.text: Who is the detective played by Martin Shaw in a t.v. series set in North East England in the 1960's. Detective Chief Inspector Alan Banks

H3.text: Who is the detective played by Martin Shaw in a t.v. series set in North East England in the 1960's. George Gently

A4.text: Shaw played the title role in the BBC TV series Inspector George Gently.

A5.text: Shaw portrayed Ray Doyle ('Agent 4-5') in The Professionals.
